__e: Well, if you must know, I got into a fight with a pimp... and he caught me in the arm with a baseball bat.
Some pimp, maybe, who won't talk to us but will to you.
That whore your boy hangs around with.... Her pimp is an associate of mine.
You got life for killing a pimp. Then you had the bad taste to tell the prosecutor you were going to kill him too.
You're a pimp... and Ray works for you.

Since I last saw him, Sick Boy had reinvented himself as a pimp and a pusher and was here, he said, to mix business and pleasure setting up contacts, as he constantly informed me for the great skag deal that was one day gonna make him rich.
